metadata.title: CVE-2019-11842 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in Matrix Sydent before 1.0.3 and Synapse before 0.99.3.1. Random number generation is mishandled, which makes it easier for attackers to predict a Sydent authentication token or a Synapse random ID.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2019-11842` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

matrix-synapse - 0.99.2-5
No subscription required

criterions.comment: matrix-synapse package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.99.2-5').
